::Feline::

She smiled and sat down in the chair offered her. "Your very sweet. 
Thank you." She held his hand and gave it a gently squeeze.  SHe 
smiled warmly at him and purred to him.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod and Feline reached his room. He opened the door, and walked 
in.
> He offered her a chair.
> "Come on, in." He was slightly drunk, but not completly.
